pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Give helps employees make a difference in their communities by matching the time and money they donate to eligible organizations. Give also supports companywide giving events and helps employees find volunteer opportunities with eligible US-based nonprofit organizations.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: We’re excited to announce a Contoso task force charged with the mission of localizing to help communities in need. We will create regional teams, staffed by Contoso employees around the globe. These teams will deploy assistance in the event of a natural disaster or community hardship in any of the locations we operate. Giving back is one of our core beliefs at Contoso and we hope you can help us.

Contoso is passionate about the world we live in. Restoring and maintaining environmental health is a priority for us. Which is why we are pleased to launch a new campaign designed to restore the natural resources in the countries we travel and work in. We want to ensure that these areas thrive by routinely planting native fruit trees for everyone to benefit from.

To support our employees’ passion for giving, Contoso Electronics matches employee donations of time and money to nonprofit organizations. Each October, our fun and spirited employee Giving Campaign—a tradition since 1983—makes a significant annual impact in addition to generous giving year-round.

Accelerating global progress towards a more sustainable future. Since 2009, Contoso Electronics has made and met a series of commitments to reduce the company’s carbon footprint. While we’ve made progress toward our goal of cutting our operational carbon emissions by 75 percent by 2030, the magnitude and speed of the world’s environmental changes have made it increasingly clear that we must do more. And we are taking new steps to do just that.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: The driving force behind our mission

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Contoso Electronics employees are passionate about giving time, money, and skills to address the issues facing our world. It’s part of our culture and how we live our mission.

We support first responder organizations through technology donations and financial support during response and recovery efforts. We also work to help organizations increase preparedness and get ahead of the response curve while also improving their ability to respond to future disasters.
